component.attributes:
&standard_uicomponent_attributes;
longitude false java.lang.String 31.14 The longitude you wish the map to point to
latitude false java.lang.String 30.01 The latitude you wish the map to point to
address false java.lang.String
The address you wish the map to point to. If you use this attribute donot longitude or latitude attributes.
locationNotFoundErrorMessage false java.lang.String (GClientGeocoder) service not found the address location The error message that should appear if the address location doesnot exist
width false java.lang.String 500 The width of the map. Default value is 500.
height false java.lang.String 500 The height of the map. Default value is 500.
zoom false java.lang.String 11 The zoom value of the map. Default value is 11.
type false java.lang.String G_HYBRID_MAP
The type of the map. It can be one of the following values (G_NORMAL_MAP, G_SATELLITE_MAP and G_HYBRID_MAP). Default value is (G_HYBRID_MAP).
renderOnWindowLoad false java.lang.String true
This flag determines whether to render the map on window load. This flag should be set to false if the map is inside a zone that will be updated by Ajax
enableDragging false java.lang.String true
This flag determines whether to support map dragging. Default is true.
addStreetOverlay false java.lang.String false
Setting this flag to true enables the map to work directly with the streetViewPanorama component.
jsVariable false java.lang.String
This flag determines the JavaScript variable you want to use for referring to the map. It should unique. Use this attribute if you want to use write additional JavaScript code for the map to customize it.
